div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1146 Myrmecium (mod. Cape Karantin), just N of Kerch', Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1949 Burial: c. 63 B.C. (Golenko) Contents: 16 AE Panticapaeum: 1 AE (as BMC 34) Unc. Bosporus: 12 AE (as Minns, pl. 9, 21) Amisus: 1 AE (as RGA I.1, pl. 7, 22-24) Sinope: 2 AE (as RGA I.1, pl. 26, 6-7) Disposition: Leningrad â€ Belova, MIA 85 (1958), pp. 332, 343-4, nos. 219-34 Krushkol, VDI 1952, no. 3, pp. 137-47
